I'm confused. We use a listIterator on ArrayLists in other places with no 
problems.

Ah, I see the problem. I'm a dope and I didn't read all of the API I was 
calling.

Fixed in BreakpointsView#initializeCheckedState(). With the clown shows I'm 
putting on lately, I should join the circus. If you want to use a listIterator 
to remove items from a list, it helps to use a modifiable list.

Please verify, DarinS.
